achievements: Known as the 'Butcher of Lyon' for his brutal actions during World War II.
Known for his intense and controversial performances in films by Werner Herzog.
Starred in films such as 'Aguirre, the Wrath of God' and 'Fitzcarraldo'.
Pioneer of electronic music and ambient music.
Known for his lengthy, atmospheric compositions.

occupation: Economist, Founder and Executive Chairman of the World Economic Forum
achievements: Founded the World Economic Forum in 1971
Author of several books on globalization and international economics
Won the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1985 for the discovery of the quantum Hall effect
